body:
We are happy to announce our COVID19 ready Horseback Riding and Wine Tasting* Tour! 

This tour begins with a scenic drive up the coast to a privately owned rustic ranch. Your wrangler will guide you on a beautiful horseback ride that winds through the forest and up into the Santa Ynez Mountains where you will enjoy spectacular views of the Pacific Ocean and the Channel Islands. After enjoying a delicious boxed lunch you will then be escorted to two of the regions top wineries* where you will enjoy some of California’s finest wines. Tour price includes door to door transportation from anywhere in Santa Barbara, a 90 minute horseback ride, and lunch. Tour returns to Santa Barbara at approximately 4:00 pm. Please call for details if you are interested in our 90 minute beach ride option.

\*Option for those staying in Santa Barbara to choose one distillery and one winery instead of two wineries.

We are following strict cleanliness guidelines and will arrive to pick up your party in a fully sanitized vehicle with extra wipes, hand sanitizer, and gloves for all. Guests must provide their own masks.
priceLong: $230 per person. Please call or email to book or if you have any questions.
